properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 2:37AM PST until January 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, southwest winds 25 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 12 to 15 feet at 11 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 15 to
25 kt and seas around 9 feet at 12 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from
10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 AM to 6 PM PST Friday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Seas will be
especially steep and hazardous.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM PST FRIDAY
